snippet: A public investigation of the death of Alexander V. Litvinenko, a former K.G.B. officer poisoned in London in 2006, would be able to hear testimony in secret, the judge said.
abstract: Britain's Judge Robert Owen urges government to hold public inquiry into 2006 death of Alexander V Litvinenko, former KGB officer poisoned in London.
lead_paragraph: A public investigation of the death of Alexander V. Litvinenko, a former K.G.B. officer poisoned in London in 2006, would be able to hear testimony in secret, the judge said.

headline.seo: British Judge Urges Public Inquiry Into Litvinenko Death
headline.main: British Judge Urges Public Inquiry Into Litvinenko Death
headline.print_headline: Britain: Judge Urges Public Inquiry Into Former K.G.B. Officer’s Poisoning
